user.description: Choose how you want to authenticate with Laddel.
user.title: Laddel EV Charging

oauth_info.description:
OAuth2 authentication requires additional server setup for redirect URIs. For now, please use the manual refresh token method.

To get your refresh token:
1. Install a network monitoring app on your phone
2. Open the Laddel app and log in
3. Monitor network traffic to id.laddel.no
4. Find the refresh_token in OAuth requests
5. Copy the refresh token value

Click 'Back' to use the refresh token method.
